original: “Ye dhammā yaṁmūlā, ye cekatthā pakāsitā muninā”ti.
analyzed: ye dhammāḥ ya mūlāḥ ye cekatthā pakāsitāḥ muninā ati

original: Ekasmiṁ padaṭṭhāne yattakāni padaṭṭhānāni otaranti, sabbāni tāni samāropayitabbāni.
analyzed: ekasmim padaṭṭhāne yattakāni padaṭṭhānāni otaranti sabbāni tāni samāropayitabbāni

original: Yathā āvaṭṭe hāre bahukāni padaṭṭhānāni otarantīti.
analyzed: yathā āvaṭṭe hāre bahukāni padaṭṭhānāni otaranti iti

original: Tattha samāropanā catubbidhā padaṭṭhānaṁ, vevacanaṁ, bhāvanā, pahānamiti.
analyzed: tattha samāropanā catubbidhā padaṭṭhāna vevacana bhāvanā pahānam iti
kāya su caritam vacī su caritam manaḥ su carita

original: tattha yaṁ kāyikañca vācasikañca sucaritaṁ, ayaṁ sīlakkhandho.
analyzed: tattha yam kāyikam ca vācasikam ca ayam sīlakkhandho

original: Manosucarite yā anabhijjhā abyāpādo ca, ayaṁ samādhikkhandho.
analyzed: manaḥ su carite yā anabhijjhā a byāpādaḥ ca ayam samādhi kkhandho

original: Idaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, tattha sīlakkhandho ca samādhikkhandho ca samatho, paññākkhandho vipassanā.
analyzed: idam padaṭṭhāna tattha sīla kkhandho ca samādhi kkhandho ca samatho paññā kkhandho vipassanā

original: Idaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, tattha samathassa phalaṁ rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, vipassanāya phalaṁ avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti.
analyzed: idam tattha samathassa phalam rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti vipassanāya phalam avijjā virāgā paññā vimutti

original: Vanaṁ nāma pañca kāmaguṇā, taṇhā vanatho.

analyzed: vanam nāma nimitta ggāhaḥ itthī iti vā puriso ti vā

original: Vanatho nāma tesaṁ tesaṁ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṁ anubyañjanaggāho “aho cakkhu, aho sotaṁ, aho ghānaṁ, aho jivhā, aho kāyo” iti.
analyzed: vanathaḥ nāma tesam tesam aṅga paccaṅgānam anubyañjana ggāhaḥ aho cakkhu aho sota aho ghāna aho jivhā aho kāyo iti

original: Vanaṁ nāma cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni apariññātāni.
analyzed: vanam nāma cha ajjhattika bāhirāni āyatanāni apariññātāni

original: Yaṁ tadubhayaṁ paṭicca uppajjati saṁyojanaṁ, ayaṁ vanatho.
analyzed: yam tat ubhayam paṭicca uppajjati vanatho
tena āha bhagavān chetvā vanañca vanathañca ati
rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti sekkha phala
avijjā virāgā paññā vimutti asekkha phala
rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti anāgāmi phala
avijjā virāgā paññā vimutti agga phalam
rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti kāmadhātu samatikkamana
avijjā virāgā paññā vimutti te dhātu samatikkamana

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo, ñāṇaṁ, sammādiṭṭhi, tīraṇā, santīraṇā, hirī, vipassanā, dhamme
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ ñāṇa sammādiṭṭhi tīraṇā santīraṇā hirī vipassanā dhamme

original: Yathāha bhagavā “tasmātiha tvaṁ bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi, ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ”.
analyzed: yathā āha bhagavā tasmāt iha tvam bhikkhu kāye kāya anupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa
vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa anti samādhi indriya

original: Evaṁ kāye kāyānupassino viharato cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: evam kāye kāya anupassinaḥ viharataḥ cattāro sati paṭṭhānāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro sammappadhānāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro iddhipādā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāraḥ iddhipādāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Catūsu iddhipādesu bhāviyamānesu pañcindriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: catūsu iddhipādesu bhāviyamānesu pañca indriyāni bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Sabbe hi bodhaṅgamā dhammā bodhipakkhiyā niyyānikalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā, te ekalakkhaṇattā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: sabbe hi bodhaṅgamāḥ dhammāḥ bodhi pakkhiyāḥ niyyānika lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇā te eka lakkhaṇa ttā bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Kāye kāyānupassī viharanto “asubhe subhan”ti vipallāsaṁ pajahati, kabaḷīkāro cassa
analyzed: kāye kāya anupassī viharantaḥ asubhe vipallāsam pajahati kabaḷīkāro ca ssa

original: āhāro pariññaṁ gacchati, kāmupādānena ca anupādāno bhavati, kāmayogena ca visaṁyutto
analyzed: āhāraḥ pariññam gacchati kāma upādānena ca anupādānaḥ bhavati kāma yogena ca visa yuttaḥ

original: bhavati, abhijjhākāyaganthena ca vippayujjati, kāmāsavena ca anāsavo bhavati, kāmoghañca
analyzed: bhavati abhijjhā kāya ganthena ca vippayujjati kāma āsavena ca anāsavaḥ bhavati

original: uttiṇṇo bhavati, rāgasallena ca visallo bhavati, rūpūpikā cassa viññāṇaṭṭhiti pariññaṁ
analyzed: uttiṇṇaḥ bhavati rāga sallena ca visallaḥ bhavati rūpūpikā ca ssa viññāṇa ṭṭhiti

original: gacchati, rūpadhātuyaṁ cassa rāgo pahīno bhavati, na ca chandāgatiṁ gacchati.
analyzed: gacchati rūpadhātuyam ca assa rāgaḥ pahīnaḥ bhavati na ca chandāgatim gacchati

original: Vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto “dukkhe sukhan”ti vipallāsaṁ pajahati, phasso cassa
analyzed: vedanāsu vedanā anupassī viharantaḥ dukkhe sukhanti vipallāsam pajahati phassaḥ cassa

original: āhāro pariññaṁ gacchati, bhavūpādānena ca anupādāno bhavati, bhavayogena ca visaṁyutto
analyzed: āhāraḥ pariññam gacchati bhava upādānena ca anupādānaḥ bhavati bhava yogena ca visa yuttaḥ

original: bhavati, byāpādakāyaganthena ca vippayujjati, bhavāsavena ca anāsavo bhavati, bhavoghañca
analyzed: bhavati byāpāda kāya ganthena ca vippayujjati bhava āsavena ca anāsavaḥ bhavati bhava ogham ca

original: uttiṇṇo bhavati, dosasallena ca visallo bhavati, vedanūpikā cassa viññāṇaṭṭhiti pariññaṁ
analyzed: uttiṇṇaḥ bhavati dosa sallena ca visallaḥ bhavati vedanūpikā ca ssa viññāṇa ṭṭhiti

original: gacchati, vedanādhātuyaṁ cassa rāgo pahīno bhavati, na ca dosāgatiṁ gacchati.
analyzed: gacchati vedanā dhātuyam ca ssa rāgaḥ pahīnaḥ bhavati na ca dosa āgatim gacchati

original: Citte cittānupassī viharanto “anicce niccan”ti vipallāsaṁ pajahati, viññāṇaṁ cassa
analyzed: citte citta anupassī viharantaḥ anicce niccanti vipallāsam pajahati viññāṇam ca ssa

original: āhāro pariññaṁ gacchati, diṭṭhupādānena ca anupādāno bhavati, diṭṭhiyogena ca visaṁyutto
analyzed: āhāro pariññam gacchati diṭṭhupādānena ca anupādānaḥ bhavati diṭṭhi yogena ca visayuttaḥ

original: bhavati, sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthena ca vippayujjati, diṭṭhāsavena ca anāsavo bhavati,
analyzed: bhavati sīlabbata parāmāsa kāyaganthena ca vippayujjati diṭṭhāsavena ca anāsavaḥ bhavati

original: diṭṭhoghañca uttiṇṇo bhavati, mānasallena ca visallo bhavati, saññūpikā cassa viññāṇaṭṭhiti
analyzed: diṭṭha ogham ca uttiṇṇaḥ bhavati māna sallena ca visallaḥ bhavati saññūpikā ca ssa viññāṇa ṭṭhiti

original: pariññaṁ gacchati, saññādhātuyaṁ cassa rāgo pahīno bhavati, na ca bhayāgatiṁ gacchati.
analyzed: pariññam gacchati saññādhātuyam ca ssa rāgaḥ pahīnaḥ bhavati na ca bhaya āgatim gacchati

original: Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharanto “anattani attā”ti vipallāsaṁ pajahati, manosañcetanā
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharantaḥ anattani attā ati vipallāsam pajahati manaḥ sañcetanā

original: cassa āhāro pariññaṁ gacchati, attavādupādānena ca anupādāno bhavati, avijjāyogena
analyzed: cassa āhāraḥ pariññam gacchati atta vāda upādānena ca anupādānaḥ bhavati avijjā yogena

original: ca visaṁyutto bhavati, idaṁsaccābhinivesakāyaganthena ca vippayujjati, avijjāsavena
analyzed: ca bhavati ida sacca abhinivesa kāya ganthena ca vippayujjati avijjā āsavena

original: ca anāsavo bhavati, avijjoghañca uttiṇṇo bhavati, mohasallena ca visallo bhavati,
analyzed: ca anāsavaḥ bhavati uttiṇṇaḥ bhavati moha sallena ca visallaḥ bhavati

original: saṅkhārūpikā cassa viññāṇaṭṭhiti pariññaṁ gacchati, saṅkhāradhātuyaṁ cassa rāgo pahīno
analyzed: saṅkhā rūpikā cassa viññāṇa ṭṭhiti pariññam gacchati saṅkhāra dhātuyam cassa rāgaḥ pahīno
bhavati na ca moha āgatim gacchati
